tool_description: Conducts systematic research into ownership history and documentation trail of objects to establish legal status and historical context.

accession_number.description: Unique identifier of object being researched

known_owners.description: Names of known previous owners or dealers

date_ranges.description: Known date ranges for ownership periods

research_priority.description: Research urgency: routine, moderate, high, legal_concern

researcher_name.description: Name of person conducting provenance research

wartime_concern.description: Whether object may have wartime provenance issues

error_messages: Object not found: Accession number does not exist in collection database
Invalid research priority: Must be one of [routine, moderate, high, legal_concern]
Empty researcher name: Researcher name cannot be empty
Date format error: Date ranges must be in YYYY or YYYY-YYYY format
Access denied: Researcher does not have permission for this research level
Database connection failed: Unable to access external research databases
usage: Conduct thorough provenance research using all available clues and documentation. Prioritize cases with potential legal or ethical concerns. Document all sources and findings meticulously.

documentation_status.description: Quality of provenance documentation: excellent, good, fair, poor, incomplete

legal_concerns.description: Any legal or ethical issues identified

research_confidence.description: Confidence level in findings: high, medium, low

gaps_identified.description: Periods or aspects needing further research

sources_consulted.description: List of sources and databases searched
